title: L LEPIDO L F AN
PROCVLO
MIL LEG V MACEDON
Y LEG EIVSD Y LEG EIVSD II
Y LEG VI VICTRICIS
Y LEG XV APOLLINAR
PRIM LEG XIII GEMIN
DONIS DONATO AB IMP
VESPASIANO AUG BELLO
IVDAICO TORQVIB ARMIL
PHALERIS CORONA VALLARI
SALINATORES CIVITATIS
MORINORUM OB MER EIUS
SEPTIMIA F REPONEND
CURAVIT
translation: To Lucius Lepidius Proculus, son of Lucius, of Aniensis tribe,
Centurion of the same legion two times
Primus Pilus of VI legion Gemina
awarded by Imperator Vespasianus Augustus during the Jewish War
(made by) Salinatores from Morini's territory on his merits.
His daughter, Septimia, took care of restoring.

bibliographies.citation: Cenerini Francesca. Notizie di economia dall'iscrizione riminese CIL XI 419. In: Mélanges de l'Ecole française de Rome. Antiquité, tome 109, n°1. 1997. pp. 21-30;
